name: Abyssal Loop
description: A burning chain blade inscribed with lava runes, suspended above a molten altar, surrounded by raging hellfire and glowing ground fissures. Forged from molten lava, it requires life as fuel.
description_ch: 一把刻有熔岩符文的燃燒鏈刃，懸浮於一座熔融的祭壇之上，周圍環繞著熊熊的地獄之火與發光的地面裂縫。以熔岩熔鍊而成的鏈刃，需以生命作燃料。
